title: Liberia President Sets Dec. 25 Goal For No New Ebola Cases
teaser: Ebola has killed more people in Liberia than any other country â€” just over 3,100. And it continues to be a problem in Liberia's countryside. But the number of new cases overall in the West African nation dropped over the last two months, according to health officials.
